project_goal: Build a high-density 'Command Center' dashboard for Probation Officers using Next.js 14, Tailwind, and Supabase.

design_system.typography: Inter for text, Monospace for Case Numbers

user_stories.title: Project Scaffolding & Supabase Client
user_stories.description: Initialize Next.js 14 app with Tailwind. Configure the Supabase client helper to read from the environment variables. Ensure 'Inter' font is loaded.
acceptance_criteria: Tailwind config includes custom colors from Design System

user_stories.title: Probationer Grid (TanStack Table)
user_stories.description: Create a high-density data table fetching data from the 'probationers' Supabase table. Use the schema_context.json to map columns correctly.
acceptance_criteria: Columns: Case # (Mono), Name, Phone, Risk Level (Badge)
Risk Level Badge colors: Low=Green, High=Orange, Warrant=Red

user_stories.title: Case Detail Drawer
user_stories.description: Clicking a row in the Grid opens a right-side Sheet (Drawer) showing details. Fetch related 'appointments' for that user.
acceptance_criteria: Drawer displays Probationer Name & Case Number in header
List last 3 appointments sorted by date desc
